name: Jumper
summary: Jumper is a game by Matt Thorson. The player is given control of Ogmo, a red character made of rectangles. Ogmo is equipped with the ability to double jump. Using this, he must escape the lab he was created in which is now abandoned. The game is quite well known for its baby-punching tendencies.
info:
• 平台: Windows
  • 游戏类型: Platformer
  • 游玩人数: Single Player
  • 发行日期: 2004
  • 官方网站: http://mattmakesgames.com/games.php#Jumper
  • 开发者: Matt Thorson
